info.name: YouTube 2014 Skin
info.description:
Vote here for what we should do next

READ THE FOLLOWING BEFORE YOU USE THE STYLE

  • Be sure you are using the old YouTube
  • Make sure you have autoplay turned off
If you do not do the following, the style will either not work at all, or will break.

Most Recent Updates

This list gets reset every week or so

  • Updated the upload button due of a update on YouTube itself.
  • Fixed bug where button text was out of place at times.
  • Updated "Show More" and "Show Less" buttons in the description of videos.
  • Removed "YouTube TV" and "YouTube Red" buttons from the sidebar.
  • Updated video error to it's 2014 aesthetic.
  • Fixed bug where on channels the old YouTube logo wouldn't appear, rather the new, ugly, one.
info.additionalInfo: Thanks to ColorZilla's CSS Gradient Generator. Thanks to The Web Archive for the archives of YouTube in 2014 Thanks to ImgBb for image hosting. Thanks to YouTube for existing.
